name: PriceFallback
description: RedStone Oracle Fallback contract. Utility contract to get price from price feed.

eventDecorators.name: AddedAsset
eventDecorators.description: Event emmited after asset is authorized.

eventDecorators.name: DeletedAsset
eventDecorators.description: Event emmited after asset is deauthorized.

eventDecorators.name: ResetPriceFeed
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted after feed is reset.

eventDecorators.name: TimestampDelayChanged
eventDecorators.description: Ecent emitted after timestamp delay is being changed.

functionDecorators.name: addressToSymbol
functionDecorators.description: Map that authorizes assets (address to hash-symbol).

functionDecorators.name: getAssetPrice
functionDecorators.description: Get current price of asset (in CELO).

functionDecorators.name: getAssetPriceExt
functionDecorators.description: Get current price of several assets (in CELO).

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: resetPriceFeed
functionDecorators.description: Set new feed. Feed must be compatible with IPriceFeed interface.

functionDecorators.name: timestampDelay
functionDecorators.description: Timestmap of each price update lifecycle.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
